remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控制項的用戶端識別碼是超過 16 個字元，ASP.NET 會替代唯一對應的簡短名稱。If the client identifier of a control is longer than 16 characters, ASP.NET substitutes a uniquely mapped short name. 會對應到頁面上的用戶端識別碼的所有參考，導致不論對應相同的回傳。All references to the client identifier on the page are mapped, resulting in the same postback regardless of mapping. 也弄亂必須經過加密，基於安全性的用戶端識別碼。can also scramble client IDs that must be encrypted for security reasons.
